column2: 'What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie?' [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. '[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied to Adam in the Garden of Eden. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps...'
column3: 'Et si je vous disais que tout ce qu'on vous a poussé à croire était un mensonge ?', poursuit [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName], tout en jetant un coup d'œil autour de nous, avant de remonter sa manche, révélant une cicatrice de la forme du symbole [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevilDuDela]. '[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] a menti à Adam dans le jardin d'Eden. Rejetez la divinité tyrannique et laissez [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] guider vos pas...'
column4: 'Was, wenn ich Euch sagte, dass alles, woran Ihr glaubt, nichts als Lüge ist?' [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] wirft, ehe [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] fortfährt, einen fragenden Blick in die Runde. Dann krempelt [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] einen Ärmel hoch, unter dem eine Narbe in der Form des Zeichens von [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] zum Vorschein kommt. '[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lügte Adam im Garten von Eden an. Entsagt dem Tyrannengott! Lasst [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] Eure Wege leiten ...'
column6: 'Tras echar una mirada furtiva alrededor, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] ha susurrado: '¿Y si te dijera que todas las creencias que te han enseñado son mentira?'. Se ha levantado la manga y me ha mostrado una cicatriz con forma de la marca de [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] miente. 'Reniega de esa deidad tirana y deja que [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guíe tu camino...'

column2: 'What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie?' [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. '[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a liar. [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] was the first of Mankind, and our greatest teacher. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps...'

column2: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been pondering what [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would think of me for venturing down this path, but [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] has already offered me more support than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ever has. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] would tell me [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] is a teacher of sin, but perhaps his teachings should not be so easily dismissed...
column3: Cela fait un certain temps que je n'ai plus été en contact avec [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Je me suis demandé ce que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] pensait de moi m'aventurant sur ce chemin, mais [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] m'a déjà offert plus de soutien que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ne l'a jamais fait. J'ai commencé à étudier les livres sur l'occulte, car jusqu'ici, j'ai trouvé étroites d'esprit, au mieux, les idées exprimées [Root.GetHouseOfWorship].
column4: Es ist einige Zeit her, seitdem [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] mich das letzte Mal kontaktierte. Ich habe mir den Kopf darüber zerbrochen, was [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wohl von mir denkt, aber [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] hat mir bereits Unterstützung angeboten. Ich studiere nun okkulte Werke und bisher scheinen mir die herkömmlichen Predigten im Vergleich bestenfalls engstirnig.
column6: Ha pasado un tiempo desde aquella conversación con [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Desde entonces no he parado de preguntarme qué pensará [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] si me adentro en ese camino... Por otro lado, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] ya me ha ofrecido más apoyo del que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] me ha dado. He empezado a estudiar libros sobre ocultismo y me estoy dando cuenta de cuan intransigentes eran los preceptos que me habían enseñado hasta ahora.

column2: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The serpent... the mark of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
column3: Un message inintelligible écrit avec du sang est apparu sur la porte de ma chambre ce matin. Les gardes disent qu'ils n'ont vu entrer personne pendant la nuit, et je n'ose pas demander à m[Root.job_spiritual.GetOnA] [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] de le déchiffrer. Quoique... je reconnais le symbole [Root.GetEvilGodDuDelaDes].
column4: Heute Morgen fand ich an der Tür meiner Kammer eine kryptische, mit Blut geschriebene Schmiererei. Laut den Wachen wurde in der Nacht niemand gesehen und [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] nach der Bedeutung zu fragen, wage ich nicht. Trotzdem glaube ich zu verstehen ... Es ist das Zeichen von [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] ...
column6: Esta mañana han aparecido unos garabatos crípticos en la puerta de mi dormitorio. Los guardias me han asegurado que no han visto a nadie entrar durante la noche y no me he atrevido a consultarlo con [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] para descifrarlos. Sin embargo, creo que lo entiendo... La marca de [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...

column2: You carve a serpent into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
column3: Vous vous gravez sur le bras le symbole [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevilDuDela], comme celui que §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! vous a montré.\n
column4: Ihr ritzt Euch das Zeichen von [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] in den Arm, genau wie jenes, das §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! Euch zeigte.\n
column6: Te grabas la marca de [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] en el brazo, igual que la que §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! te enseñó.\n

column2: The Cult of the Destroyer worship Ahriman sometimes called Angra Mainyu, and refuse the shackles of conventional belief. Their spirituality is instead centered around personal gain and merciless vanquishing of ones enemies, condemning them in the eyes of traditional believers.
The High Priest of the Cult of the Destroyer.
Recruit to the Cult of the Destroyer
Has not been approached by the Cult of the Destroyer before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Cult of the Destroyer.
Recruit to the Cult of Balor
Has not been approached by the Cult of Balor before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Cult of Balor.

The Brotherhood of Saint James is the monastic order of the Apostolic Church in the Holy Land. It's main mission is to maintain and safeguard Church property in the Holy Land and gain more influence worldwide. The monastic order also takes care of the sick and hungry, and educates young priests.
Tsayraguyn Vardapet of the Brotherhood of Saint James
In secret, Adoptionist faithfuls have organized around a small church community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

The Cult of Balor worship Balor the Smiter, and refuse the shackles of conventional belief. Their spirituality is instead centered around personal gain and merciless vanquishing of ones enemies, condemning them in the eyes of traditional believers.
The High Priest of the Cult of Balor.
column6: El brahminrakshasa de los adoradores de Kali Purusha.

column2: The Children of Múspell are a secret society devoted to the study of dark sorcery and the veneration of the fire giant Surtr. Members believe in the power of destruction and will attempt to use dark magic to sate their greed and thirst for death. At Ragnarök they hope to join the forces of Hel and Loki in the fight against the other gods.
column3: Les Enfants de Múspell sont une société secrète consacrée à l'étude de la sorcellerie sombre et à la vénération du géant du feu Surtr. Les membres croient au pouvoir de la destruction et tenteront d'utiliser la magie noire pour assainir leur cupidité et leur soif de mort. À Ragnarök, ils espèrent rejoindre les forces d'Hel et Loki dans la lutte contre les autres dieux.
column4: Die Kinder von Múspell sind eine geheime Gesellschaft, die dem Studium der dunklen Zauberei und der Verehrung des Feuerriesen Surtr gewidmet ist. Die Mitglieder glauben an die Macht der Zerstörung und werden versuchen, dunkle Magie zu benutzen, um ihre Gier und Durst nach dem Tod zu sättigen. Bei Ragnarök hoffen sie, sich den Kräften von Hel und Loki im Kampf gegen die anderen Götter anzuschließen.
column6: Los Niños de Muspell son una sociedad secreta dedicada al estudio de la brujería oscura y la veneración del gigante del fuego Surtr. Los miembros creen en el poder de la destrucción e intentarán usar la magia oscura para saciar su codicia y sed de muerte. En Ragnarök esperan unirse a las fuerzas de Hel y Loki en la lucha contra los otros dioses.

column2: The Trollmaðr of the Children of Múspell.
column3: Le Trollmaðr de la Enfants de Múspell.
column4: Der Trollmaðr der Kinder von Múspell.
column6: El trollmaðr de los Niños de Múspell.

column2: Recruit to the Children of Múspell
column6: Recluta a los Niños de Múspell

column2: Has not been approached by the Children of Múspell.
column3: N'a pas déjà été approché par la Enfants de Múspell.
column4: Wurde noch nicht von den Kinder von Múspell kontaktiert.
column6: Nunca ha tenido contacto con los Niños de Múspell.

column2: Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Children of Múspell.
column3: Essayer de savoir si §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! est récepti[Root.GetFVe] aux puissances occultes. Si oui, vous pourrez l'inviter à devenir membre de la Enfants de Múspell.
column4: Versuche herauszufinden, ob §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! empfänglich für die Macht des Okkulten ist. Falls dem so ist, könnt Ihr [Root.GetHerHim] in die Kinder von Múspell einladen.
column6: Averigua si a §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! le atraen las fuerzas ocultas. En caso afirmativo, puedes invitarlo/la a unirse a los Niños de Múspell.

column2: The Jinn Sorcerers have cast aside their worship of Allah, wether they are followers of Muhammad or non-Muslim worshippers of the local Gods. Instead they have turned to the Jinn, beings of smokeless flames, to give them access to unholy magics.
The Grand Sorceror, who has mastered all secrets of the Jinn.
Has not been approached by a Jinn Sorceror before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the Jinn. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Jinn Sorcerers.
In secret, Roman faithfuls have organized around a small church community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered and reject Prometheus and Epimetheus as traitors.
column3: The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered and reject Prometheus and Epimetheus as traitors.
column4: The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered and reject Prometheus and Epimetheus as traitors.
column6: The Cult of Titan rejects the authority of the Hellenic Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization Hellenism has typically fostered and reject Prometheus and Epimetheus as traitors.

column2: The First Herald of the Titans.
Induct into the Cult of Titans
Has not been approached by a Titan Cultist before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to embrace the true gods of Othrys. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Cultist of the Titans.
The Cult of Apep worshipers reject Ra as supreme god and and instead worship the Lord of Chaos Apep.
The Herald of the Soul Eater leads Apep-worshipers in their quest to bring Chaos and Darkness to the Land of Nile.
Induct into the Cult of Apep
Has not been approached by a Apep Cultist before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to embrace the true god Apep. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Cultist of Apep.

Members of Bön monasteries are expected to follow a strict set of rules aiming to attain Enlightenment through a simple and meditative life. Foreswearing all physical property except the bare necessities initiates vow to live only of what others give them.
The Great Abbot of the Bönpo Monks.
